content:
Publications of Exact Reaction Leaping Methods

List of publications related to exaction and hierarchical reaction leaping:
  1. David Orendorff, Eric Mjolsness. A Hierarchical Exact Accelerated Stochastic Simulation Algorithm. In review, 2012. [webpage]
  2. David Orendorff. Exact and Hierarchical Reaction Leaping: Asymptotic Improvements to the Stochastic Simulation Algorithm , PhD Thesis, UC Irvine, 2012 . [PDF]
  3. Eric Mjolsness, David Orendorff, Philippe Chatelain, and Petros Koumoutsakos. An Exact Accelerated Stochastic Simulation Algorithm. Journal of Chemical Physics 130, 144110 (2009). [webpage]
